Tamil KG syllabus

items.title: Flash Cards
items.summary: Flashcards are one of the most common tools used in teaching. They are pretty easy to use and versatile.
items.content_html:
Flashcards are one of the most common tools used in teaching. They are pretty easy to use and versatile.

Yet,they are often underutilized.

Flashcards are used to improve vocabulary, memory drills and more. With kids REPETITION IS THE KEY.

What are the fun methods with which we can use flashcards?

  1. Set up a sensory bin with Rava(Sooji) / Rice,put the flashcards inside and ask them to take a particular card.
  2. If you've Ice-cream sticks with you, write the letter and ask your child to pickup the matching Flashcard.
  3. Ask your child to use the Flashcard to make sentences.(Improves their vocabulary)
  4. Match the Flashcard with real object.(Ex.Vegetables Carrot-bring the real carrot)

 

DOWNLOAD Free printable and make Your own Flashcard.

 

Tamil Uyir ezhuthukkal

items.title: Vegetables
items.summary: Vegetables and Fruits are essential part of our daily life. It is colourful and our little ones also love…
items.content_html:
Vegetables and Fruits are essential part of our daily life. It is colourful and our little ones also love them. I have preapred a small set of vegetable Pdf for your little ones. You can use them to teach the names of the vegetables.

Here is the link of the pdf: 

 media/files/Vegetables.pdf

 

 

If you have doubt in pronouncing the vegetable names , look at our YouTube channel:

https://youtu.be/PObSD8D4k4E
